data.text: @roxy_mojo Right there with you. This looks like the picture of someone doing hard core cardio training. But it’s not. I spent most of that 12 months resting, the crazy spikes happening when I walked to the bathroom. https://t.co/vvRLBv5Pug
@calirunnerdoc Absolutely. I know people must tire of my posts. But people need to see. It’s not feeling sleepy or wanting a rest. It’s chronic multi-system destruction. Thank you.
@roxy_mojo My sedentary heart rate today. I’ve spent most of the day in bed 🤷🏻‍♀️ https://t.co/DqDGrpLJDy

@RJDixon741 @roxy_mojo It’s a Circul ring, that connects via Bluetooth to my partner’s phone. An alarm wakes him up if my sats drop below 90, and it generates a nightly report in the app. It’s expensive, but I need to have proof.
@roxy_mojo Clots are what I imagine as well. A basic chest X-ray won’t be sufficient for that, but they have to get it out of the way. 😔
@LaRougeAbeille I have oxygen and a cpap machine now. There’s not a lot they can really do- but it’s important that we get oxygen support and use meds to stop further fibrosis etc.

@LaRougeAbeille They may be able to do a home sleep study for you. That’s what I did.  I crash hard also. 💔 I have a pulmo appt tomorrow so hopefully we will schedule a VQ scan again to check for clots. Major reason for low sats with long Covid. But we will see. I will update after appt.
@roxy_mojo At this point, just ruling out really obvious stuff. I don’t know if they’ll be willing to look any deeper. Are you getting support for your low sats?
